Title: Eliminates certain penalties assessed in relation to certain notice requirements for payment and cessation of compensation in certain circumstances; repealer
Summary: Eliminates penalties assessed against employers or insurance carriers for failure to comply with certain notice requirements relating to payment and cessation of compensation in certain circumstances.
LawCode: Amd §25, rpld §25 sub 3 ¶(g), Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to eliminating certain penalties assessed in relation to certain notice requirements; and to repeal certain provisions of the workers' compensation law relating thereto
